ygData.subject: Unique Items
ygData.msgSnippet: I think this would be a good forum to ask for this.  Currently I am developing a site for EQ dedicated strictly to the items, how to get them, and buy/sell
ygData.messageBody:
I think this would be a good forum to ask for this. Currently I am
developing a site for EQ dedicated strictly to the items, how to get them,
and buy/sell them (in game only of course). I'm not interested in the
standard Leather Arms, etc. There are plenty of sites out there that deal
with this. I *am* interested in anything out of the ordinary, where it came
from and the quest associated with it. This is a full-on spoiler option,
which I have no personal problem with, and if you're subscribed to this list
neither should you.

All I ask is 3 quick things for submissions: a screen shot displaying the
item and the stats on it, a brief description of how you came across it, and
the quest information associated. The second two are optional since even I
hate campers, but they'd really help those of us who go get the item, then
leave the spawn to the others to do the same.

A. Would EQ players go to this site?
B. Is this a good idea?

Anyone wishing to help out will get credit on the site for the submissions
(of course).

E-mail any submissions to trajen@...

Thanks all!

Trajen D'Fraust
Barbarian Shaman
Lord of the Divinity, Order of Deus Vult
